title: Bug 21834 - Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834 - Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout. Build 2002071610021.
OB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row is deleted. As a result, the Launch item is moved to the first row instead of staying on the second row.
EB: The Launch item should remain on the second row after deleting an item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Launch the software.
2. Press the Delete button.
3. Observe the first item on the second row being deleted.
4. Notice that the Launch item moves to the first row instead of staying on the second row.
